title: The Emerald Radiance: Diamond and Emerald Grand Haaram
materials: 22K Gold base with Hyderabadi Polish. Adorned with meticulously set brilliant-cut diamonds and vibrant green emeralds. Diamond clarity: VS-SI. Gold purity verified.
features: Intricate floral and paisley designs, studded with diamonds and emeralds. The central pendant showcases a radiating pattern around a larger emerald, enhanced with delicate drop-shaped diamond accents. Detailed 'Nakshi' work adds a traditional South Indian touch. The adjustable dori ensures a perfect fit.
colors: Predominantly gold and white (diamonds) with striking green emerald accents
creating a rich and regal color palette.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Also suitable for high-end social events and cultural gatherings.
description: This Grand Haaram is a timeless masterpiece, blending traditional South Indian design with modern elegance. The combination of dazzling diamonds and vibrant emeralds creates a captivating sparkle, making it a true statement piece. Its durability ensures it will be treasured for generations. Represents prosperity and good fortune, making it an auspicious gift.
